title: Huub Stevens replaces Markus Gisdol as Hoffenheim coach
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer: Sports - Today 
Hoffenheim has sacked coach Markus Gisdol and named veteran Huub Stevens as his successor, with the 61-year-old signing a contract until the...
